content: पॄ {c3c} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> (पिर्पींत, पृणाति, पपार, अपारीत्, परि-री-ष्यति, परि-री-तुं, पूर्ण; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} पूर्यते; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} पूरयति-ते; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} पिपरि-री-षति, पुपूर्षति) {@--1@} To fill, fill up, complete. {@--2@} To fulfil, gratify (as hopes &c.). {@--3@} To fill with wind, blow (as a conch, flute &c.). {@--4@} To satisfy, refresh, please; पितॄनपारित् <ls>Bk. 1. 2</ls> {@--5@} To rear, bring up, nourish, nurture, cherish.
